CHAT.comment: GAIL ATWATER, ET AL., Petitioners v. CITY OF LAGO VISTA, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT C. DE CARLI ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROGER J. GEORGE ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDY TAYLOR AS AMICI CURIAE SUPPORTING RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT C. DE CARLI ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:04 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
